T02D2222:63a-1: byakta bh'a ba aa nu ga tantr'a [?] siddhi /
T02D2222:63a-3: dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid grub pa /
T02D2222:63a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2222:63a-5: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2222:63a-6: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2222:63a-7: 'gro ba rnams kyi bde chen rgyal po gcig pu nyid //
T02D2222:63a-8: rgyu rnams dang bral rtag tu 'byung bar gyur pa ste //
T02D2222:63a-9: gang zhig gis ni nye bar brjod pa'i dus dag tu //
T02D2222:63a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa tshig gis dbul gyur rgyal gyur
T02D2222:63a-11: cig / bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la yun ring
T02D2222:63a-12: du // rtag tu gus pas bkas gnang khyad par ni //
T02D2222:63a-13: bdag nyid dran phyir bdag nyid bris 'di la //
T02D2222:63a-14: skye bo mkhas pa su zhig sdang bar byed //
T02D2222:63b-0: 'dir gnyis su @63b med cing rang bzhin gyis rnam
T02D2222:63b-1: par dag pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas skabs su
T02D2222:63b-2: / bdag nyid kyis don te rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2222:63b-3: bdag nyid skyes pa dang bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te /
T02D2222:63b-4: rang gi ngo bo nyid 'byin pa po'i rang bzhin
T02D2222:63b-5: du dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su ston par mdzad
T02D2222:63b-6: de ; lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i
T02D2222:63b-7: nyams dga' ba'i bu mo la kun du bltas nas
T02D2222:63b-8: dga' ba dang bde ba'i 'dod pa'i yid du gyur
T02D2222:63b-9: de ; nas / bcom ldan 'das shin tu chags
T02D2222:63b-10: pa dang bcas pa'i rol pa dang bcas nas kun
T02D2222:63b-12: de nas shin tu 'jam zhing des pa'i gsung gis thugs 'dzin par mdzad cing /
T02D2222:63b-13: de'i 'og tu de la dri zhim pos mthug por
T02D2222:63b-14: byug pa'i dri bsung chags pa bsnams pas thugs tshim
T02D2222:63b-15: par mdzad do // de nas thugs nyams su lon
T02D2222:63b-16: pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyas bkus pa bzhin du
T02D2222:63b-17: dga' ba dang bde ba chen po thob nas /
T02D2222:63b-18: tsham tshom med par bde ba'i bye brag dag gis 'khyud do //
T02D2222:63b-19: de nas bdag nyid don byas pa bzhin du yid
T02D2222:63b-20: la sems shing dpe med pa'i ro myang ba'i phyir
T02D2222:63b-21: 'o bya ba'i rnam pa dag mdzad do //
T02D2222:63b-22: de las kyang sos 'debs pas gcod pa dang /
T02D2222:63b-23: 'bigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag dag khyad par du mdzad do //
T02D2222:63b-24: de'i rjes la yang shin tu bde ba skyes pas rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2222:63b-25: skabs skabs su shin tu 'jam pa'i sen mos 'debs pas sad par byed do //
T02D2222:63b-26: de nas kyang mgrin pa nas gya gyu'i sgra zab
T02D2222:63b-27: mo sgrogs pa la sogs pa rol pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2222:63b-28: gyi rnam pa lnga rmi lam lta bu la bdag
T02D2222:63b-29: nyid gar mkhan lta bus kun du rtse bar mdzad
T02D2222:63b-30: do // de dag gis ni de'i sems kyi khyad
T02D2222:63b-31: par thob par bya ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa'i
T02D2222:63b-32: sgrub pas rjes su spyod par mdzad par gyur pa
T02D2222:63b-33: do // yin no // mdza' bos chags pas kun
T02D2222:63b-34: du blta zhing de yi rjes su sbrang rtsi 'dzag
T02D2222:63b-36: de nas dga' ba'i char 'bebs lags pa'i mtsho skyes bskyod pas de la kun 'khyud pa'i //
T02D2222:63b-37: rim gyis chags pa'i ro yis de ni su yin bdag kyang cir 'gyur ma shes te //
T02D2222:64a-0: grogs rnams sngar mi bde ba tshig @64a * //
T02D2222:64a-1: gis brjod du ma btub pa zhig skyes par 'gyur //
T02D2222:64a-2: 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2222:64a-3: yid las byung ba las skyes pa'i spros pa'i rgyun
T02D2222:64a-4: gyis 'ching ba 'dis gnyis ka bcing ste gang gi
T02D2222:64a-5: gnyi ga'i sems kyi 'jug pa ji srid du gzhan
T02D2222:64a-6: mi dran zhing dga' ba'i dran pa la phyogs pa
T02D2222:64a-7: ste / 'jug pa'i dga' ba'i gdung bas chags te
T02D2222:64a-8: zhu bar gyur nas chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa
T02D2222:64a-9: bzhin du ltos pa med par rgyun mi 'chad par
T02D2222:64a-10: ste / 'gyur ro // de'i 'og tu nang du
T02D2222:64a-11: rgyu ba'i sems kyi 'jug pa'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus
T02D2222:64a-13: / ma bsams par ka ra na'i bye brag dag las gsal bar byed cing /
T02D2222:64a-14: gnyi ga yang sid ces zer zhing thams cad la
T02D2222:64a-15: cher ltos pa med cing tsham tshom med pa dang
T02D2222:64a-16: bcas pas shin tu rgya che ba'i dga' ba'i sgrub
T02D2222:64a-18: de las kyang bde ba'i bya ba shin tu goms
T02D2222:64a-19: pa'i longs spyod kyis thibs po kun sad par byas
T02D2222:64a-20: te / dga' ba dang bde bas yang dag par spel ba 'jug pas bskyed pa ni /
T02D2222:64a-21: dbang po las 'das shing rang gi rtag pa'i spyod
T02D2222:64a-22: yul 'khor ba'i snying por gyur pa bde ba'i phung
T02D2222:64a-24: 'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba mtshan mar bcas pa ni /
T02D2222:64a-25: gang yin de nyid mtshan ma spangs par gyur pa ni //
T02D2222:64a-26: rang byung ye shes nyid kyi ngo bor gyur pa ste /
T02D2222:64a-27: rtog pa rnams kyi stong pa'i bde ba chen po yin /
T02D2222:64a-28: bag chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyis de kho na nyid 'byung ba'o //
T02D2222:64a-29: de lta bu 'di las sgyu ma lta bu thog
T02D2222:64a-30: ma med pa nas rang gis byas pa'i 'khor ba
T02D2222:64a-31: na bag chags kyi rgyun shin tu phra bas shin
T02D2222:64a-32: tu g-yo zhing gzung du med pa'i sems kyi rgyun
T02D2222:64a-33: gyis 'jug pas nyams pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus blang
T02D2222:64a-34: bar gyur pas / phyi rol du gzhag pa'i rtog pa mtha' dag gi sgrib pas g-yogs te /
T02D2222:64a-35: mi mngon par gyur pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid dag
T02D2222:64a-36: pa'i rang bzhin skye 'gro'i gtso bo gang yin pa
T02D2222:64a-37: de rlung dang bcas pa'i khu ba'i thigs pa rnams
T02D2222:64a-38: dang lhan cig tu btsun mo'i tshigs la bab pa
T02D2222:64a-39: rnyed pa na / lte ba'i 'og tu kha thur
T02D2222:64b-0: la bltas pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma @64b brgyad
T02D2222:64b-1: pa'i nang du khrag 'dzag pa'i lhag ma kun du
T02D2222:64b-2: rnyed pa na / gzung ba ste / de'i rjes la yang dag par padma zum par gyur to //
T02D2222:64b-3: de yang khrag dang khu ba gnyis ka yang chu
T02D2222:64b-4: dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du gyur nas gong
T02D2222:64b-5: bu gcig tu gyur te rang gi rang bzhin rtsom
T02D2222:64b-6: par byed do // de nas rdzas su 'gro ba'i
T02D2222:64b-7: rim gyis nur nur po la sogs pa yongs su
T02D2222:64b-8: gyur pas rim gyis skye ste /
T02D2222:64b-9: 'byung ba mtha' dag tshogs nye bar bsags pa rnyed
T02D2222:64b-10: nas gang dus la sogs pa lnga po 'dus pa
T02D2222:64b-11: der tshor ba des dngos po gsal ba'i de kho
T02D2222:64b-12: na nyid 'di ston par byed cing /
T02D2222:64b-13: phung po lnga dang ldan pa'i tshor ba'i bdag nyid kyi lus su 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:64b-14: nang gi tshor ba de so sor nye bar 'gro
T02D2222:64b-15: ba 'brel pa shin tu nges par thams cad la
T02D2222:64b-16: khyab cing thams cad du 'gro ba yang shin tu
T02D2222:64b-18: 'byung ba yang dag par ldan pas de phyogs gcig
T02D2222:64b-19: par gyur nas phyi rol dbang po lnga'i grong gi
T02D2222:64b-20: rjes su 'gro zhing yid kyis brtags pa'i phyi rol
T02D2222:64b-21: du gyur pa'i gzugs la sogs pa gzung ba dang
T02D2222:64b-22: 'dzin par gyur pas mngon par zil gyis mnan te
T02D2222:64b-23: / nga rgyal dang gti mug dang ser sna dang
T02D2222:64b-24: 'jigs pa dang mya ngan dang phrag dog dang brtse
T02D2222:64b-25: ba dang sred pa dang sdug pa dang mi sdug
T02D2222:64b-26: pa la sogs pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong
T02D2222:64b-27: ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2222:64b-28: skye ba snga mar byas pa'i las kyi rgyu las ni //
T02D2222:64b-29: sems de 'di ru skye ba yongs su len cing 'gro //
T02D2222:64b-30: de yi rgyu yis ma lus 'di dag thams cad ni //
T02D2222:64b-31: bag chags bcas pa'i sems kyi byed par 'gyur ba nyid //
T02D2222:64b-32: de ltar 'khor ba'i gnas skabs so //
T02D2222:64b-33: de ltar 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs su rung zhing rgal dka' ba /
T02D2222:64b-34: nga rgyal chu bo gting zab pa /
T02D2222:64b-35: yul gyi rlung shin tu dag pas gcig nas gcig
T02D2222:64b-36: tu phan tshun brlabs pas rba rlabs shin tu 'khor
T02D2222:64b-37: zhing 'khrigs pas steng du 'gro ba dang 'og tu
T02D2222:64b-38: 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rgyun chags
T02D2222:64b-39: pa'i 'khor ba las shin tu sgrol bar byed pa'i
T02D2222:64b-40: gru thugs brtse ba'i bdag nyid can /
T02D2222:64b-41: mchog tu mnyes gshin ba'i bdag nyid rang bzhin thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
T02D2222:65a-0: smon lam rgya chen por btab pa'i @65a * //
T02D2222:65a-1: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi padma dag la 'khor
T02D2222:65a-2: ba gang zhig mchog tu gus pas phyag 'tshal bar
T02D2222:65a-3: mi byed / stod par mi byed sten par mi byed /
T02D2222:65a-4: mnyes par mi byed pa de dag ni rgal dka'
T02D2222:65a-5: ba'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa ma
T02D2222:65a-6: yin pa las rgal bar mi 'gyur bas yongs su
T02D2222:65a-7: brtag par bya'o // de bas na rnam pa thams
T02D2222:65a-8: cad kyi thams cad du bla ma dam pa'i zhabs
T02D2222:65a-9: kyi padma dag la nges par legs pa don du
T02D2222:65a-10: gnyer bas bsten par bya ba kho na yin no
T02D2222:65a-11: brtag par bya'o // // shin tu 'jigs su rung
T02D2222:65a-12: ba 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' med yul dang gdul
T02D2222:65a-14: rang gi rnam rtog chos kyis sprul sogs mang pos kun du 'khrugs las skye ba 'di dag ni //
T02D2222:65a-15: ji ste gru dang 'dra ba'i bla ma dam pa skyob pa byed pa de ni med gyur na //
T02D2222:65a-16: mchog tu bde ba gcig pu'i gnas gyur sangs rgyas nyid ni 'di ru ji ltar thob par gyur ;
T02D2222:65a-17: / bla ma dam pa bsnyen bkur ro /
T02D2222:65a-19: // /'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid rlung shin
T02D2222:65a-20: tu g-yo zhing bcing mi nus pa dbang po'i grong
T02D2222:65a-21: khyer mtha' dag zil gyis mnan pa /
T02D2222:65a-22: dpe med pa'i yul gyi bde bas bri la zhing zin pa /
T02D2222:65a-23: dper na ri mo mkhan gyis rang gis bris pa'i
T02D2222:65a-24: ri mo shin tu 'jigs su rung ba mthong nas
T02D2222:65a-25: / bdag nyid 'jigs shing dangs te sa la brdabs nas brgyal bar gyur pa de bzhin du /
T02D2222:65a-26: 'dir yang rang nyid kyis bde ba ma yin pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su brtags pa'i 'dod pa dang /
T02D2222:65a-27: mi 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa las
T02D2222:65a-28: byas pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa'i dbang gis
T02D2222:65a-29: rang gi rang bzhin mthong ste /
T02D2222:65a-30: 'khor lo lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam zhing
T02D2222:65a-31: 'byung ba'i dbang po gang yin pa'i rnam par shes
T02D2222:65a-32: pa 'byung ba 'di la gnas shing sna tshogs gzung
T02D2222:65a-33: ste gnas so // de yongs su mnyes pa las
T02D2222:65a-34: de'i bka' lung gis de lta bu'i rlung dbang po
T02D2222:65a-36: rgyun du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i bya ba byed
T02D2222:65a-37: pa'i lam la rnal ma nyid du gnas par byed
T02D2222:65a-38: do // des ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
T02D2222:65a-39: rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag gi 'obs kyis bskor ba'i
T02D2222:65a-40: nang du dri ma dang bcas pa'i srid pa'i chu'i
T02D2222:65b-1: srid pa'i shing spangs shing chus gtor bas bskyed de /
T02D2222:65b-2: shin tu ring bar skyes pas 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi dga' bar skyed pa dang /
T02D2222:65b-5: mkhrang zhing sbom la sna tshogs rnam pa mang po
T02D2222:65b-6: nyams su myong bar byed pa'i rgyu gsar du skye
T02D2222:65b-7: ba'i srid pa ldog par 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:65b-8: de yang lhan cig skyes pa'i rjes su tshol te /
T02D2222:65b-9: der gnas nas phyi rol thams cad spong mod kyi /
T02D2222:65b-10: de lhan cig skyes pa'i bya ba yod de /
T02D2222:65b-11: de nyid kyis 'brel zhing nyams su myong ba g-yo ba'i bdag nyid du rnam par gnas so //
T02D2222:65b-12: der yang khyad par mi dmigs pa nyams su myong
T02D2222:65b-13: ba'i dngos po slar yang nyams su myong bar bya
T02D2222:65b-14: ba'i rjes su chags pa'i 'jug pa gtod par byed
T02D2222:65b-15: do // mang pos ci zhig bya ste /
T02D2222:65b-16: gang gi tshe na phyi rol du gyur pa'i brtag
T02D2222:65b-17: pa'i rang bzhin rnam par bcad pa de'i tshe 'di
T02D2222:65b-18: rang gi ngo bo la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:65b-19: de yang gnyug ma'i yul phra mo 'jug pa la
T02D2222:65b-20: rjes su chags pa zad pas 'bad pa bcom nas
T02D2222:65b-21: bdag nyid kyi gnas la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur
T02D2222:65b-22: ro // de nas yon tan mtha' dag dang ldan
T02D2222:65b-23: par gyur pas brtan pa'i yon tan dang ldan par
T02D2222:65b-24: ro // 'gyur te / brtan pas na gzhan gyi don gyi yon tan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:65b-25: dper na nam mkha'i ngos su khyab pa'i chu 'dzin gyi tshogs stug po dengs par gyur pa na /
T02D2222:65b-26: gang du song ba mi shes pa de bzhin du
T02D2222:65b-27: rlung 'di yang sngar rgyun ma chad par 'byung ba
T02D2222:65b-28: las de ltar thim par gyur na /
T02D2222:65b-29: mchog tu ldog cing tshim pa theb pas gang du yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:65b-30: lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung rang gi gnas su gnas
T02D2222:65b-31: pas rtog pa'i tshogs las grol zhing stong pa nyid
T02D2222:65b-32: kyi rang bzhin gyis thugs tshim par byed pa ci
T02D2222:65b-34: 'di las 'khor ba 'dir thabs thugs rje chen po
T02D2222:65b-35: mang du rgyun mi chad par goms par byas pas
T02D2222:65b-36: / mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad
T02D2222:65b-37: pa'i rgyu thob pa yin pas sems brtan par bya'o
T02D2222:65b-38: / // 'di ltar nyon cig g-yo ba dang ldan pas dbang por mngon par 'gro la /
T02D2222:66a-0: dbang por mngon par 'gro bas dbang po dang don @66a * //
T02D2222:66a-2: dbang po dang don phrad pas dngos por dmigs par
T02D2222:66a-3: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa la sogs pa mngon
T02D2222:66a-4: par zhen pa shin tu mang po'i gdon gyis zin
T02D2222:66a-5: pas shin tu rgal dka' ba'i 'khor bar 'khor ro
T02D2222:66a-6: // brtan pa las spros pa'i khyad par skyes pa rnams spangs te /
T02D2222:66a-7: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi ngo bo shin
T02D2222:66a-8: tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i blo rjes su tshol
T02D2222:66a-9: te / gang gi tshe des kun du 'khyud par gyur na /
T02D2222:66a-10: de'i tshe nam mkha' bzhin du 'dres par gyur te /
T02D2222:66a-11: sngar yul rnams la dga' ba dang chags pa dang
T02D2222:66a-12: ldan pa'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i khyad par skye ba
T02D2222:66a-13: rnams med cing / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par rtog
T02D2222:66a-14: pa dang bral bas phyag rgya thams cad kyis byin
T02D2222:66a-15: rnams med cing / gyis brlabs shing / dbang po
T02D2222:66a-16: las 'das pa skye ba med pa dang ldan pa
T02D2222:66a-17: rang gi rig pa'i spyod yul can /
T02D2222:66a-18: tha snyad las 'das pa sngar mngon du ma byas
T02D2222:66a-19: pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin bde ba'i
T02D2222:66a-20: bdag nyid gtso bor gyur pa skye bar 'gyur ro
T02D2222:66a-21: // rlung gi blo ni rjes su btsal bas ni //
T02D2222:66a-22: bde ba dam pa'i ngo po rang sems ni //
T02D2222:66a-23: tshim byed de dag las gzhan mi g-yo ba //
T02D2222:66a-24: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yin /
T02D2222:66a-25: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang gzhan gsal ba de kho na nyid du sems gnas so //
T02D2222:66a-26: des sngon yongs su btang ba'i dbang po de yang
T02D2222:66a-27: yid dang bral bas byed pa med par 'gyur te
T02D2222:66a-28: / aa mas bor bas be'u ma nyid rjes su
T02D2222:66a-29: tshol ba de bzhin du de yang dbang po rnams
T02D2222:66a-30: ni yid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:66a-31: gang du yid 'jug pa der rab tu 'jug ste /
T02D2222:66a-32: gang gi phyir de ma gtogs par de dag rab tu sbyor ba med pa yin no //
T02D2222:66a-34: 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las skyes pa'i bde
T02D2222:66a-35: ba chen po'i snang ba gnas pa yin te rnam
T02D2222:66a-36: par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag spangs nas /
T02D2222:66a-37: bla na med pa'i longs spyod du nye bar 'gro
T02D2222:66a-38: zhing byed pa'i grong khyer rnams rjes su zhugs pa
T02D2222:66a-39: dang ldan pas 'gro ba 'di dag nyid bde ba
T02D2222:66a-40: chen po'i rnam par ro gcig par 'gro bar 'gyur
T02D2222:66a-41: te / dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D2222:66b-0: kyis phog pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs @66b
T02D2222:66b-1: bzhin du 'gro ba rnams snying po med par snang
T02D2222:66b-2: te / ngo // de ltar byed pa'i grong khyer
T02D2222:66b-3: rnams 'dzin pas stong zhing sems dang lhan cig 'dres
T02D2222:66b-4: te / ngo // pas / g-yo ba dang mi
T02D2222:66b-5: g-yo ba sna tshogs mtha' dag 'di snyam pa med
T02D2222:66b-6: pa'i mnyam pa'i ro bde ba phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2222:66b-7: skye ba med pa'i dpal bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D2222:66b-9: de dag gis 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te /
T02D2222:66b-10: dbang po'i grong khyer mi snang bar gyur nas ro
T02D2222:66b-11: dang 'dra ba rjes su mthun par lhan cig tu
T02D2222:66b-12: 'jug pas 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso bo nyid 'thob
T02D2222:66b-13: ste / blo'i dbang phyug gi gtso bo rang dbang
T02D2222:66b-14: can gang du 'jug pa der 'dzin pas stong pa'i
T02D2222:66b-16: skye ba'i dbang po dang 'dra bar 'jug ste /
T02D2222:66b-17: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i spyod pa rnams mdzes shing rjes su mthun par nye bar spyod la /
T02D2222:66b-18: gsal ba nyid du ston cing nye bar brten pas
T02D2222:66b-19: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i gtso bo
T02D2222:66b-20: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2222:66b-21: rnam ba gang yin pa der byed pa'i grong khyer
T02D2222:66b-22: 'di dag khyad par can du gyur nas rjes su
T02D2222:66b-24: rnam pa de ltar byed pa'i grong khyer rnams sems kyis med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2222:66b-25: gal te sems med par gyur na de'i tshe sna
T02D2222:66b-26: tshogs 'di dag nye bar zhig pas na gang du
T02D2222:66b-27: gnas par 'gyur / de bas na sems las gzhan
T02D2222:66b-28: pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yod pa ma yin no
T02D2222:66b-29: gnas par 'gyur / // dbang po'i tshogs rnams thim zhing rnam rtog ni //
T02D2222:66b-30: zad pa srid pa'i sa bon mi mthun bral//
T02D2222:66b-31: dka' dang gsal ba'i rang bzhin bsil gyur pa'i //
T02D2222:66b-32: 'di ni nam mkha' lta bur shin tu mtshar //
T02D2222:66b-33: dbang po'i grong khyer rnam par zhugs pas shes rab
T02D2222:66b-34: thabs kyi rjes su 'gro ba bde ba chen po'i
T02D2222:66b-35: sems so // yang thog ma med pa'i bag chags
T02D2222:66b-36: kyi tshogs kyi zil gyis mnan pa'i byis pa rnams
T02D2222:66b-37: 'byed par byed pas ci zhig bya ste /
T02D2222:66b-38: gal te sems nyid dngos po'i rang bzhin du ma gyur na /
T02D2222:66b-39: de ltar na ni gang las phyi rol gyi don shes /
T02D2222:66b-40: ji ste sems nyid dngos po'i bdag nyid du gyur na /
T02D2222:67a-0: de ltar yang 'di dag sems nyid yin pas rnam pa thams cad du @67a * //
T02D2222:67a-1: phyi rol gyi don skye ba yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2222:67a-2: 'di ltar ma lus pa 'di dag brtags pas stong pa'i sems nyid de skye ba dang /
T02D2222:67a-3: 'gag pa dang bral zhing rang bzhin dag pa'i gnyis
T02D2222:67a-4: su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa yongs su
T02D2222:67a-6: de dag gis 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te /
T02D2222:67a-7: rang bzhin dag pa'i byang chub kyis gang yang lhan
T02D2222:67a-8: cig skyes shing rnam par sprul pa'i yan lag bskyod
T02D2222:67a-9: pa ji snyed pa de dag phyag rgya rab tu
T02D2222:67a-11: gang yang ngag gis brjod pa'i ji snyed pa de snyed sngags kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D2222:67a-12: gang yang lhan cig skyes pa las byung ba'i rgyun
T02D2222:67a-13: mi 'chad par rnam par g-yo ba mngon par 'dus
T02D2222:67a-14: ma byas la ris su tshad med cing dpag tu
T02D2222:67a-15: med pa rnams sna tshogs pa'i ro dang ldan pas
T02D2222:67a-16: dgongs pa dang / bya ba rnams 'di ltar sgeg pa dang /
T02D2222:67a-18: 'jigs su rung ba byed pa dang /
T02D2222:67a-21: zhi ba la sogs pa'i 'dod chags dang /
T02D2222:67a-25: phrag dog la sogs pa cung zad skyes pa de
T02D2222:67a-26: dag ma lus par rang bzhin dag pa'i ye shes
T02D2222:67a-27: kyi rnam pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
T02D2222:67a-28: khams gsum sna tshogs 'di dag thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D2222:67a-29: spyod pa yang nges brjod du bstan to //
T02D2222:67a-30: de ltar la lar snying rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2222:67a-31: la lar kha cig tu ni srin po dang mtshungs par ro //
T02D2222:67a-32: la lar ni smra bar mdzad do //
T02D2222:67a-33: la lar ni mu cor smra bar ro //
T02D2222:67a-34: la lar ni srid par ro //
T02D2222:67a-35: la lar ni yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs par ro //
T02D2222:67a-36: la lar ni gnyid log par ro //
T02D2222:67a-37: la lar ni gnyid sad cing bsdams par ro //
T02D2222:67a-38: la lar ni zhim pas tshim par ro //
T02D2222:67a-39: la lar ni rul pa la sogs pa srid par ro //
T02D2222:67a-40: la lar ni chags shing zhen par ro //
T02D2222:67a-41: la lar ni gcig pu 'dod chags dang bral bar gnas par ro //
T02D2222:67a-42: la lar ni tshul khrims kyis gnas par ro //
T02D2222:67a-43: la lar ni tshul dang spyod lam ngan par ro //
T02D2222:67a-44: la lar ni brtan par gnas par ro //
T02D2222:67b-0: la lar ni rab @67b tu g-yo bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-1: la lar ni rol pa chags par ro //
T02D2222:67b-2: la lar ni rgod pa gcig pu la'o //
T02D2222:67b-3: la lar ni rab tu ngu bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-4: la lar ni rang dga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2222:67b-5: la lar ni gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'o //
T02D2222:67b-6: la lar ni mi gtsang bar gnas par ro //
T02D2222:67b-7: la lar ni shin tu gtsang spra'i spyod pa'i lus su'o //
T02D2222:67b-8: la lar ni 'chad pa la 'khor bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-9: la lar ni rmongs shing glen par ro //
T02D2222:67b-10: la lar ni cung zad kyis tshim par ro //
T02D2222:67b-11: la lar ni tshim pa med par ro //
T02D2222:67b-12: la lar ni gar bya ba'i phyir lus glod pa yid kyis 'jug par ro //
T02D2222:67b-13: la lar ni glu len pa'i gsang ba mthon po las so //
T02D2222:67b-14: la lar ni bde ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D2222:67b-15: la lar ni gcig pu sdug bsngal gyi gnas su gyur par ro //
T02D2222:67b-16: la lar ni rgyan po rtse ba la goms shing dga' bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-17: la lar ni rdul gyis gos par ro //
T02D2222:67b-18: la lar ni khrus kyis gnas pa dang bskal pa bzang por ro //
T02D2222:67b-19: la lar ni gcer bur ro //
T02D2222:67b-20: la lar ni ri mo can gyi gos bgos par ro //
T02D2222:67b-21: la lar ni sbyin pa po dang longs spyod par ro //
T02D2222:67b-22: la lar ni shin tu phongs par ro //
T02D2222:67b-23: la lar ni shin tu nges par ro //
T02D2222:67b-24: la lar ni brdzun smra bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-25: la lar ni bden ba gcig pu smra bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-26: la lar ni chos kyi rgod pa dang ldan par ro //
T02D2222:67b-27: la lar ni sdig pa chen po byed par ro //
T02D2222:67b-28: la lar ni sbyin pa por ro //
T02D2222:67b-29: la lar ni dul zhing des par ro //
T02D2222:67b-30: la lar ni rgyu'i gnas par ro //
T02D2222:67b-31: la lar ni blo bzang zhing dag par ro //
T02D2222:67b-32: la lar ni snang bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-33: la lar ni mi mthong zhing mi snang bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-34: la lar ni bdag nyid chen por ro //
T02D2222:67b-35: la lar ni mngon par shes par ro //
T02D2222:67b-36: la lar ni de nyid thim par ro //
T02D2222:67b-37: la lar ni 'byung ba la gnas par ro //
T02D2222:67b-38: la lar ni 'byung ba dang bral bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-39: la lar ni rnam pa dang ldan par ro //
T02D2222:67b-40: la lar ni ngag gi yul las 'das bar ro //
T02D2222:67b-41: de ltar gang zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam rtog dang bral dmigs med par //
T02D2222:67b-42: sna tshogs 'di dag rang bzhin dag pas spyod pa'i dgongs ldan mkhas pa ni //
T02D2222:68a-0: de yi lag na bde gshegs go 'phang bdag chen rtsom @68a * //
T02D2222:68a-2: rab dga' gzhan don la dga' mchog gis bde ba dam pa legs par gnas //
T02D2222:68a-3: skye ba med cing dga' ba gcig pu'i ro dang ldan pa'i sems //
T02D2222:68a-4: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / chos kun mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D2222:68a-5: kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad la //
T02D2222:68a-6: chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
T02D2222:68a-8: mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2222:68a-9: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gnas //
T02D2222:68a-10: tshor min g-yo ba rang bzhin med //
T02D2222:68a-11: bcom ldan so so rang rig pa //
T02D2222:68a-12: gtso bo dpe dang bral ba ste //
T02D2222:68a-13: bdag po kun 'gro kun khyab pa //
T02D2222:68a-14: byed pa po dang 'phrog pa yin //
T02D2222:68a-15: 'di ni dpal ldan rdo rje sems //
T02D2222:68a-16: dngos po gsal ba gsal mdzad yin //
T02D2222:68a-17: dpal au rgyan gyi rdo rje chen po mchog gi
T02D2222:68a-18: gnas su rang byung gi ye shes phun sum tshogs
T02D2222:68a-19: pa'i dpal rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dus nas yang dag
T02D2222:68a-20: pa'i don la gzigs mo las byung ba'i ma nor
T02D2222:68a-21: ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi mod la
T02D2222:68a-22: byin gyis rlob par byed pa /
T02D2222:68a-23: sa gsum rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su //
T02D2222:68a-24: nem nur mi mnga' pa'i zhal gyi padma rab tu
T02D2222:68a-25: rgyas pa las bde ba phun sum chogs pa'i sbrang
T02D2222:68a-26: rtsi'i rgyun 'bab par gyur pa dngos po gsal ba'i
T02D2222:68a-27: rjes su 'gro ba de kho na nyid grub pa
T02D2222:68a-29: / de ltar 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i bka'
T02D2222:68a-30: bsgo ba'i rjes su 'gro bas don chen po 'di
T02D2222:68a-31: rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus nas /
T02D2222:68a-32: skye bo nyan 'dod pa rnams la ji ltar de
T02D2222:68a-33: rnams kyi mig gi yul du gyur pa'i gzugs snang
T02D2222:68a-35: sngar ji ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin du gsal bar mdzad de mngon par bstan pa yin no //
T02D2222:68a-36: gang zhig 'byung ba'i tshogs su dgrad bar ma chud pa //
T02D2222:68a-37: des kyang bdag nyid 'ba' zhig dag par byed pa'i blos //
T02D2222:68a-38: dga' ba 'di ni grags par gyur pa rnam dag pa'o //
T02D2222:68a-39: bde ba dam pa thob gyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2222:68a-40: rnal 'byor ma tshul mtsho chen gyi ni brur gyur pa //
T02D2222:68b-0: bde ba dam pa'i @68b gnas su sgrol byed gang yin pa //
T02D2222:68b-1: de nyid grub pa bris pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2222:68b-2: skye 'gro gsum po rnams kyis dngos grub 'grub par
T02D2222:68b-3: shog / dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su grub pa
T02D2222:68b-4: de kho na nyid grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2222:68b-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma tsi tos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2222:68b-8: // / pandi ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang /
T02D2222:68b-9: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
T02D2222:68b-11: // / rang rig tsam gyi ye shes ni //
T02D2222:68b-12: nam mkha' 'dra bar mtshan nyid med //
T02D2222:68b-13: 'on kyang de la dbye yod de //
T02D2222:68b-14: rab mtshams nyid dang mtshams mo'i bar ;
T02D2222:68b-15: / snang ba dang ni snang ba mched //
T02D2222:68b-16: de bzhin snang ba thob pa can //
T02D2222:68b-17: sems ni rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02D2222:68b-18: de yi gzhi ni bshad par bya //
T02D2222:68b-19: phra ba'i gzugs can rlung dang ni //
T02D2222:68b-20: ye shes dag ni 'dres gyur pa //
T02D2222:68b-21: dbang po lam nas byung nas ni //
T02D2222:68b-22: yul rnams la ni smin par 'gyur //
T02D2222:68b-23: gang tsho snang ba ldan 'gyur ba //
T02D2222:68b-24: rlung ni bzhon par gyur pa yin //
T02D2222:68b-25: de tshe rang bzhin de thams cad //
T02D2222:68b-26: ma lus lus pa med par 'byung //
T02D2222:68b-27: rlung ni gang dang gar gnas pa //
T02D2222:68b-28: rang bzhin de dang de rjes spyod //
